product.title: Weber Carburetor Conversion Kit FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60 1973-1987
product.body_html:
This kit is to be used on later Toyota Land Cruisers with rod style throttle linkage. Fits: 9/1973 - 8/87 FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60 *Note: For 9/73 - 12/74, SKU: 542-100 air cleaner adapter is needed to use the factory air cleaner. The air cleaner adapter included with this kit works for 1/75 - 8/87 Cruisers. Engineered to fit - Designed to perform.All REDLINE kits are assembled with all the parts necessary for a quick and professional installation. Included in each kit is a complete set of installation instructions • 2 barrel 38mm • Dramatically increase horsepower, torque, and maybe even get some more miles out of a tank of fuel! • Electric choke • Tuner friendly and and can be re-jetted for better mileage or performance. Footnotes: * All kits require minor installation modifications and basic mechanical skills and hand tools. * This carburetor is not smog legal. * Carburetor kits cannot be returned once removed from box. 

Note: For best performance an electric fuel pump is recommended (505-120)
